biography: A familiar face to followers of the Hector Trophée, Ricke is known for his calm demeanor and calculated approach to the game. While he may not be the flashiest player on the course, Ricke's consistency and strategic thinking make him a formidable opponent in any format.

While details on Ricke's home club remain elusive, his dedication to the sport is undeniable. Having participated twice in the Hector Trophée, he has gained valuable experience in the unique challenges presented by this event. Though he has yet to capture either the coveted Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy, his presence is always felt.
It is believed that Ricke has retired from participating in the Hector Trophée, but only time will tell.
